## Header 1

```{r setup}
library(targets)
library(tidyverse)
tar_config_set(store = here::here("_targets"))
source(here::here("R/functions.R"))
lipidomics <- tar_read(lipidomics)
```

## Making a table

```{r}
lipidomics %>%
  summarise(mean = mean(value), sd = sd(value), .by = metabolite) %>%
  mutate(across(c(mean, sd), ~ round(., 1))) %>%
  mutate(mean_sd = glue::glue("{mean} ({sd})")) %>%
  select(Metabolite = metabolite, `mean (SD)` = mean_sd)
```
